WRITING.TEXT: I don't have a recipe, I winged it. It's delicious....

These were made quite by mistake and easily by using 2x the amount of butter in a standard shortbread cookie recipe. They flattened out nicely and were buttery and crisp. You could adjust to taste I'm sure. I added chocolate ganache to the center. Finished w/ powder sugar. I also melted the butter, instead of softening.

Got a little drunk, deboned the brined turkey, cooked some sausage stuffing, turned the double breast over, plopped down the stuffing turned it back over and tucked it all in then baked it. I keep the legs and fry them later.

WRITING.TITLE: [Homemade] Stuffed brined turkey breast. From Thanksgiving.
[Pro/Chef] Mocha silk pie; chocolate cookie crust; sweet mascarpone

WRITING.TEXT: Once it's set out and pics have been taken there is a separate wooden board for crostini and the cuttable cheese.

This is what the couples want, looks nice in photos. When your wedding day is over all you have left is the pics. This isn't some high class catering gig where people are dishing out thousands of bucks. It's wood fired pizza and apps. These are cool, relaxed people who love everything we do. You're right though, without the flowers and micro I probably could have fit one more tacky cheese cube on there.
Tongs did the job, as they always do.
Pepper jack, Gouda and cheddar cubes. This is from catering season last summer and this particular wedding they also wanted brie and blue. Prosciutto, salami, and capicola for meats.

WRITING.TEXT: Homeless dude said "I HOPE YOU BREAK YOUR TAILBONE" after my friends and I wouldn't give him money.

I met OK Go twice when I was in highschool. I'd say they're recognized these days, they make cool music videos AND they were on Sesame Street. GZA asked me backstage after a show once. His bouncer told us we could drink, smoke, whatever... But not to eat his hummus. He then invited me back to the Holiday Inn. I politely declined. Sorry, Gary.

This is one of my favorite songs, but I enjoy most of their older tunes. Saw them at The Paradise in Boston when I was 7 months prego. Stood upstairs, everyone was super nice to me. The show was amazing.
We don't have that brand in New England, at least I've never seen it. Places just started carrying Lacroix. However, I'll always be loyal to my Polar.

WRITING.TITLE: Die Antwoord - Fish Paste [Alternative Hip Hop]

WRITING.TEXT: Are you fortunate enough to have the Polar Seltzer variety where you are? You haven't lived until you've had "Eggnog" or "Jalapeo Citrus Margarita" or "Unicorn Kisses" flavored seltzers.
Nah I actually enjoy cottage cheese. I actually enjoy seltzer, too. I'm a freak.
Yes, it is vinegary and the right amount of spicy, but it turned my already gross snack an unappealing pink shade.

WRITING.TEXT: [removed]

I am back of house, but yes, this is completely why. Same goes for the meal. It doesn't matter if you order 2 meals, or 1 that we turn into 2. It takes as long as making 2. Top it off that I work in Portland, Maine. Have you ever been to Commercial in July? Busy is in understatement. We're cramming in all our business into 3 months, and you wanna pay for a $17 meal 8 different ways. GTFO.

I don't work in fast food, but have worked in the restaurant industry for roughly half my life... People who order one meal to share, ask for it split on 2 plates, and then modify each side... Screw you. They usually pay on 2 credit cards also, to really stick it to you.
EVERYTHING is closed 8 months of the year. I'm from Vacation Land, where the only important people, are the ones who don't live here.
I cannot get the spot out.
Caught one today and came to see how rare it may be. It would make sense not to be a rare one around here, I live in Maine. The pine tree state.

Clefairy is all that's around me in Portland, Maine. They were never sparce to begin with :( Haven't seen Chansey yet but luckily I caught one awhile ago. Have 5 5k eggs going now and hoping for my Porygon. Using Omanyte as my buddy.

Tauros, catch them often in Portland, Maine. I have 108/149 but after the Halloween event I can evolve my Doduo, Diglett, Abra, Exeggcute, and some others. I catch a decent amount of Dratini on the wharf I work on, too. Not enough to fully evolve, but Omw.
